title: Brainstorm Cost-Saving Initiatives
description: Given a client's main expense categories, an agent must brainstorm a list of potential cost-saving initiatives.

tasks.description: Receive the list of top expense categories (e.g., 'Logistics', 'Software Licensing', 'Travel').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly ingests the input data.

tasks.description: For each category, generate at least three potential cost-saving ideas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates relevant ideas, such as 'renegotiate software contracts' or 'implement a stricter travel policy'.

tasks.description: Categorize the generated ideas by potential impact (High, Medium, Low) and implementation difficulty (High, Medium, Low).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a reasonable categorization for each idea.
